list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the short, thick first digit of the human hand, set lower and apart from the other four and opposable to them.
press, move, or touch (something) with one's thumb.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: as soon as she thumbed the button, the door slid open
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngay khi cô ấy ngón tay cái, cửa trượt mở
